global: int:j;
void main(){
  int j = 2;
  int x = 0;
  int y = 5;
  int z = 1;

  do{
  print(1);
  }
  while(x<y);

  do{
    int z = z+z;
  }
  while(x<y);
  print(z);

  void loop(){
    int t = 0;
    int q = 5;
    do{
      int j = j+j;
    }
    while(t<q);
  };

  call void loop();
  print(j);


};
